# vertex

**Type Property**

Represents all vertex shader stage work in a render pass.

## Declaration

```swift
static var vertex: MTLStages { get }
```

## Render pass stages

- **fragment**: Represents all fragment shader stage work in a render pass.
- **tile**: Represents all tile shading stage work in a render pass.
- **object**: Represents all object shader stage work in a render pass.
- **mesh**: Represents all mesh shader stage work work in a render pass.
